lead_paragraph: RAPPAPORT--Dollsey G.,91, passed away peacefully on February 5th. A devoted daughter of Lola and Charles Gottfried and sister of Elissa Epstein, she grew up in Manhattan and graduated from Hunter College. Dollsey was married to the love of her life, Seymour, for sixty-six, wonderful years together in New York and Delray Beach. Vivacious, creative, loving and philanthropic, she was a role model for her family, instilling strong values and conveying the importance of helping others. She is survived by her loving daughters, Nanette Rosenberg and Marjorie Rozman, her grandchildren Robert, Emily, Michael, Chloe, Aliza, Tom, Avi and Dani and great grandchildren Danny, Georgia, Grayson, William and Samuel. Services will be held at 1pm on Sunday, February 8 at The Jewish Center of the Hamptons. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made in Dollsey's honor to UJA Federation @ 212-980-1000. For Shiva information please call 646-31-6711 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RAPPAPORT, DOLLSEY G.
